content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":144190,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0bef4e5b-89e2-49c5-acdd-9b6ef757951d/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0bef4e5b-89e2-49c5-acdd-9b6ef757951d/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0bef4e5b-89e2-49c5-acdd-9b6ef757951d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":248,\"height\":246},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Srinivas Reddy – India GDO Head\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As head of EPAM India’s Global Delivery Office, Srinivas manages the company’s India operations based in Hyderabad and Pune and is responsible for overall global delivery, including human resources, recruitment, finance, IT, training, and quality. He has over 25 years of experience in IT in the areas of delivery, program and project management, software development, testing and support services, and training and education services.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to EPAM, Srinivas served as the Managing Director of Alliance Global Services, a Philadelphia-based software product development and testing company. During his tenure as Managing Director, the company's India operation more than quadrupled in size to 1,000 employees. Before Alliance, he was the Director of Technology at Oramasters in India (a startup company acquired by Kenexa/IBM) that provided software solutions to customers in Europe and the Middle East. Prior to returning to India in 2000, Srinivas worked for eleven years in the United States. He holds a bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering from NIT in Surathkal, India and a master’s degree in mechanical engineering from the Stevens Institute of Technology in New Jersey, USA.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":148684,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b525de0a-4e97-4f52-9c35-32720fd47f0c/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b525de0a-4e97-4f52-9c35-32720fd47f0c/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b525de0a-4e97-4f52-9c35-32720fd47f0c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":241,\"height\":239},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{\"size\":37842,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d2a6bca9-4f85-4b81-ad68-27e7ab0499b7/2.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d2a6bca9-4f85-4b81-ad68-27e7ab0499b7/2.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"2.JPG\",\"name\":\"2.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d2a6bca9-4f85-4b81-ad68-27e7ab0499b7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":807,\"height\":389.99999999999994},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sandeep Joshi – Head of Delivery\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Sandeep is responsible for building EPAM India’s strategic accounts and developing and growing the company’s DevOps and Cloud, Financial Services, Quality Engineering and BI & Big Data practices. He has over 23 years of experience in the areas of product and IP development, technology solutions, delivery management, leadership development and P&L management.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An engineering professional with agile, lean thinking and architectural skills, Sandeep has experience in leading large development efforts from concept to release by combining his knowledge of established models, engineering practices and a metrics-driven approach with strong team collaboration. He is passionate about designing and delivering innovative solutions to help our customers solve their business problems.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to EPAM, Sandeep was the VP, Solution Delivery at Alliance Global Services, a Philadelphia-based software product development and testing company. Before Alliance, he worked in a telecom product development contact center, call center and with IVR products. Sandeep holds a bachelor’s degree in engineering with computer science from Manipal Institute of Technology.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":14667,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/79708f49-201f-4411-b8a0-f9cfe5e931dd/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/79708f49-201f-4411-b8a0-f9cfe5e931dd/Picture3.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"79708f49-201f-4411-b8a0-f9cfe5e931dd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":237,\"height\":230},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Basha Syed – Head, Delivery Management Office\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Basha Syed heads Delivery Management for EPAM India and all engagements from India’s Global Delivery Office. He plays an instrumental role in planning client development strategies, leading strategic delivery efforts and building delivery management capabilities for India.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An engineering professional at his core, Basha focuses on embracing the best engineering delivery practices from inception through production adoption for EPAM India. He has nearly 21 years of experience in IT in the areas of application development, delivery management, project management, performance engineering, quality assurance and testing.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to EPAM, Basha worked as the Vice President, Project Delivery at Alliance Global Services, a Philadelphia-based software product development and testing company. During his tenure, he was responsible for managing delivery governance of strategic accounts and contributed to delivery management practices and processes within the company. Before Alliance, he was a Lead Performance Engineering Consultant with Capgemini.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Basha holds a bachelor’s degree in electronics and communication engineering and has a postgraduate diploma in computer applications from the University of Hyderabad.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":15832,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bc506ab9-4aa5-4ca3-9e15-171d9ae79e38/Picture4.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bc506ab9-4aa5-4ca3-9e15-171d9ae79e38/Picture4.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture4.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture4.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bc506ab9-4aa5-4ca3-9e15-171d9ae79e38\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":238,\"height\":259},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Santhosh Madiraju – Head of People\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Santhosh leads HR for EPAM India. He has over 24 years of diverse experience in leading the HR function in Product/Services technology space.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Santhosh has worked in senior leadership roles and has extensive experience in designing and setting up HR systems, talent management and leading change efforts. He oversaw two mergers and acquisitions and was the strategic lead for multiple organization transitions. In 24 years, Santhosh has played multiple roles in key HR functions of a strategic business partner, compensation & benefits, and learning and development.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Santhosh is passionate about building high performance culture/teams and brings deep insights in the intersection between managing talent and business outcomes, leveraging contemporary practices of cognitive psychology, behavioral economics, and neuroscience.  He believes in results driven mindset with deep business focus about driving change and transformation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Santhosh is a Gallup-Certified Strengths and a practitioner of MBTI, Social Styles and Neuro-Leadership Results Coach. He loves to use strengths-based psychology to coach leaders, managers, and teams. Using his strengths, he energizes leaders, teams, to build a culture of individual and group excellence.  Santhosh has a Ph.D. in Social Sciences from the University of Glasgow (U.K.) and was awarded British Chevening Fellowship for his doctoral studies.  He lives in Hyderabad with his wife and daughter. He loves playing tennis and shuttle badminton and enjoys watching sports. He also enjoys reading books on business, behavioral economics, and management.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":130351,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02c981ed-7961-4227-9c81-71509694df3a/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02c981ed-7961-4227-9c81-71509694df3a/Picture5.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture5.png\",\"name\":\"Picture5.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"02c981ed-7961-4227-9c81-71509694df3a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":242,\"height\":243},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Kalyan Vadrevu – Head of Talent Acquisition\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Kalyan joined EPAM India in July 2019 as Director, Talent Acquisition. Kalyan has more than 23 years of experience in Human Resources function with a major focus on Talent Acquisition. Kalyan was associated with companies like Franklin Templeton Investments, Wells Fargo, UBS, IBM, Satyam, and Divine. He has setup Talent Acquisition from the scratch for Global and Domestic IT services and Large Financial Captive organizations. He holds a post graduate degree in Human Resource Management from Andhra University. He is based in Hyderabad and is an avid reader. He has a collection of more than 1000 books in his personal library.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":98649,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1dd040ed-45ca-4909-9c2a-3f95968a2bfe/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1dd040ed-45ca-4909-9c2a-3f95968a2bfe/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1dd040ed-45ca-4909-9c2a-3f95968a2bfe\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":255,\"height\":267},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manaw Jaiswal – Head of Staffing, RD & Anywhere\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manaw leads the Talent Development Team at EPAM India and manages several strategic accounts. As part of the Talent Development Team, Manaw is focused on hiring the right engineering talent and building educational practices and processes so that every EPAMer can learn new skills.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manaw has 20 years of experience in IT engineering where he served in various roles. Beginning his career as a developer, Manaw then became a project manager and delivery manager. In his management roles, he has managed multiple software development projects delivering end-to-end solutions for medium to large enterprises. Prior to EPAM, Manaw was a developer at a small enterprise. He holds a master’s degree in management from Sikkim Manipal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manaw is people-oriented and loves food and cooking in his free time. He enjoys going on long drives at least once each year.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":19482,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3463f9ca-6b52-4a41-81ac-67f72e95db20/Picture7.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3463f9ca-6b52-4a41-81ac-67f72e95db20/Picture7.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture7.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture7.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3463f9ca-6b52-4a41-81ac-67f72e95db20\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":252,\"height\":253},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nandini Bhatnagar – Head of Marketing\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nandini is an Integrated Marketing and communications specialist with over 17 years of experience across verticals of Public Relations, Digital & social media, Events and Corporate Communications. Over the course of her career, she has been a strategic partner to both business & culture teams in order to promote an organization’s unique capabilities and growth opportunities to potential target audiences. She has led Branding and Communication strategy development for organizations and delivered to amplify organizational mainstream and social media presence, curate and build thought leadership, drive cohesive external and Internal campaigns, and create partnerships with external platforms & online communities. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In her role as Director – Marketing, Nandini’s focus is towards building EPAM's brand presence in India. In her previous roles, she has worked for organizations like Sun Life, Publicis Sapient & Tech Mahindra. She is a graduate from ShriRam College of Commerce from Delhi University and alumni of DPS RK Puram. Nandini is based out of Gurgaon, India. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"She is also a certified fitness trainer and loves to listen to music and read. She lives with her husband and 12-year-old son and looks forward to travelling with them to the mountains.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":119194,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/11d05cfc-0bdc-4367-a7f0-6142d6ae52e0/Picture8.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/11d05cfc-0bdc-4367-a7f0-6142d6ae52e0/Picture8.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture8.png\",\"name\":\"Picture8.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"11d05cfc-0bdc-4367-a7f0-6142d6ae52e0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":231,\"height\":229},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mahesh Patil – Site Leader, Pune Office\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mahesh heads EPAM Pune office and is responsible for its growth. He has over 25 years of experience in the IT industry across various areas of delivery, program and management, client management and P&L management. He has mostly worked in financial IT services domain. Mahesh has also worked for over 10 years in the USA. Before joining EPAM, Mahesh has worked with organizations like Cognizant, Atos and Wipro. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":28172,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/379664b0-2477-4b50-b1d3-2daf24d2dd11/Picture9.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/379664b0-2477-4b50-b1d3-2daf24d2dd11/Picture9.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture9.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture9.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"379664b0-2477-4b50-b1d3-2daf24d2dd11\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":241,\"height\":244},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vanita Aggarwal – Site Leader, Bangalore Office\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vanita brings with her over 21+ years of IT Industry experience in Digital Strategy and Transformation, spanning areas of eCommerce, CRM, UI, cloud, AI and middleware. She has worked with key platform players in the market like SAP, Salesforce, Adobe, IBM, Oracle, and industry leaders like IBM, Accenture, DXC and Capgemini in the past. Being very passionate about technology, she loves to interact with customers, and help deliver strategic solutions. She has travelled extensively and worked with customers across the globe. In her role at EPAM India, Vanita heads our Digital Engagement Practice, including Salesforce. Vanita loves travelling and reading. She is very passionate about sustainability topics and is also an active member of our CSR initiatives.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":163382,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f05a7863-e72f-4a0f-8f5c-2838a53ac890/Picture10.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f05a7863-e72f-4a0f-8f5c-2838a53ac890/Picture10.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture10.png\",\"name\":\"Picture10.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f05a7863-e72f-4a0f-8f5c-2838a53ac890\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":245,\"height\":250},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Jaskaran Bawa – Site Leader, Gurgaon Office\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Jaskaran has 30 years of experience in building software products in various domains. He graduated from Delhi College of Engineering in 1990. Over the last 10 years, Jaskaran has been involved in the data and analytics space, creating several successful products in the telecom domain. In his previous role as SVP Big Data & Analytics at Mobileum (a telecom product organization), he seeded the analytics’ practice in the organization and created analytics products in the telecom fraud and roaming space. Prior to that he worked at Guavus, an analytics start-up, where he was involved in creating products for subscriber profiling and network optimization.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":161333,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/71bd4f3b-1dc7-40c2-be27-a888bf0ef440/Picture11.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/71bd4f3b-1dc7-40c2-be27-a888bf0ef440/Picture11.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture11.png\",\"name\":\"Picture11.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"71bd4f3b-1dc7-40c2-be27-a888bf0ef440\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":245,\"height\":249},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ramakrishnan Venkatasubramanian – Site leader, Chennai Office\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ramakrishnan is responsible for building the EPAM Chennai delivery center and also for growing the Digital Engagement practice in India. Ram has over two decades of Technology and Business leadership experience across leading Product and Digital services firms like iNautix Technologies, Wipro, Cognizant and Athenahealth. Over the years, he has played various leadership roles in product innovation and development, setting up COEs, technology consulting, growing technology practices, and large-scale delivery. Ramakrishnan is an avid speaker and an industry thought leader in the areas of Digital Transformation. He is a proud owner of two US patents in disruptive technologies as well. Ram holds a Masters’ in Computer Applications from the College of Engineering, Guindy, Chennai. Ramakrishnan is a resident of Chennai. He is a weather enthusiast and blogger, besides he enjoys long drives and plays cricket during his free time.
